entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind light except southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections overnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
